name: Fruggy in the Middle
description:
Fruggy is stuck in the middle and desperate to eat fluffy flies but there is someone who's more hungry than fruggy and wants to eat fruggy.

Can you keep the fruggy safe when the danger mounts on his head ?

Instructions:

- Use W,A,S,D to go over the flies and eat them while keeping fruggy ahead of the one who wants to eat fruggy.

- Before starting the game please click inside the game window to avoid unnecessary view change.
